summary: Adds a new Merchant to the Game.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][b][color=#f1c232][size=5]Content of the Mod[/size][/color][/b]

Tired of travelling to every City one after another just to buy some Iron or Steel for smithing? I guess Rhangar is then the perfect choice for you.
Rhangar the Merchant is a Merchant with a big amount of metals to sell!

[/font]You can find him at [b][color=#1e84cc]Belethor's General Goods[/color][/b] in [b][color=#1e84cc]Whiterun[/color][/b].

[line][color=#f1c232][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][color=#1e84cc][b]latest Version[/b][/color] of Skyrim
[/list]
[line][b][color=#f1c232][size=5]Installation
[/size][/color][/b]
Download the Mod with the [color=#1e84cc][b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b][/color] or download it manually and place the [b][color=#1e84cc]RhangarTheMerchant.esp[/color][/b] in Skyrims [color=#1e84cc][b]Data[/b][/color] folder.

[line][b][color=#f1c232][size=5]Uninstall

[/size][/color][/b]Uninstall the Mod with the [color=#1e84cc][b]Nexus Mod Manage[/b]r[/color] or delete the [b][color=#1e84cc]RhangarTheMerchant.esp[/color][/b] from Skyrims [b][color=#1e84cc]Data[/color][/b] folder.

[line][color=#f1c232][size=5][b]Changelog

[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ff00]1.0.0[/color]
[list]
[*]initial release
[/list]
[line][size=3]Please let me know if there are any problems/bugs. :)

[/size]
[size=1]Reminder: English is not my native language.[/size]
author: Maints
